action.des: With Justin Upton batting, Ian Kinsler picked off and caught stealing 2nd base, pitcher Mike Clevinger to first baseman Carlos Santana to shortstop Francisco Lindor.

action.event_es: Retirado en Viraje en Intento de Robo 2B
